text:
The🦋butterfly effect of @EUScienceInnov support:

@BioNTech_Group CEO Uğur Şahin speaks about the impact of #EU #Science & #Innovation- sustained funding for #mRNA #Cancer treatment from the 5-7th FP helped to mature #tech that years later made the 💉#COVID19 #vaccine possible🔄 https://t.co/TDYCcEB5tE
